thread.title: David Pepper
thread.title_full: Lifestyle Furniture reviewed by David Pepper

author: David Pepper
title: David Pepper
text: The jali sheesham furniture was delivered on time and was well packed. The three pieces were a match in colour and the design was as per catalogue. The pieces make my living room look fantastic and the big plus for me is they were fully assembled. Yay no flat Packs!
